messages.content:
Hey Marcus! 👋

Good to see you! Here's what's happening in our support operations right now:

**Current Queue Status:**
• 40 tickets total in queue - all being processed
• Averaging 3.2 hours response time (solid performance)
• CSAT holding strong at 4.4/5

**What I'm Seeing Today:**
• **Shipping questions** leading the pack at 14 tickets (35%) - mostly WISMO and delivery timing questions
• **Account management** requests at 10 tickets (25%) - subscription upgrades and payment updates
• **Product feedback** coming in at 8 tickets (20%) - customers sharing reviews and recipe questions

**Good News:**
Our customers are staying satisfied with 4.22/5 average scores across our 16 active customers. The shipping questions are routine stuff, not complaints - just people excited about their orders!

Anything specific you want me to dive into? I can pull detailed patterns on any category or flag anything that needs your attention.
